# f5xc_waf_exclusion_policy (Resource)

Manages a WAFExclusionPolicy in F5 Distributed Cloud.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the WAFExclusionPolicy.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the WAFExclusionPolicy will be created.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the WAFExclusionPolicy.
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels to apply to the WAFExclusionPolicy.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the WAFExclusionPolicy.
